desc: Hello, my name is Louie Pires and I am the founder of Trexseo, an online retail store designed for commission-based selling. Trexseo is an online store that has an expanding product range of over 500 new products a day, but it has a unique financial opportunity. Every day around the world, people are influencing other people to buy things either deliberately(by suggesting that they do so) or unintentionally (by making others desire something they have like a new coffee mug, tablet or phone.) Trexseo taps into these interactions by allowing users to make accounts and sell products on the store to anyone. Every product that somebody buys because of their recommendation, the user will get a 10% commission without any fees and without ever having to buy or ship the product. People have began making careers off of this platform, as it takes away the limitations of traditional sales. No longer do you have to be limited to the types of products at one store or the number of products available. Trexseo is an ever-expanding store tapping into all genres. Traditional sales has a poor commission incentive, and it is still taxed heavily. Trexseo has a 10% commission rate with no fees or added taxes. We need people with more experience on the platform. Trexseo is offering all users who create an account through freelancer a 15% commission rate. All users who create an account will be given $1 in Trexseo credit, and they will receive an additional $5 in credit for every recommendation they give that results in an active user account. The real money is in the sales. The opportunity is immense. People who use Trexseo can make six or seven figures sending mass product recommendations and getting large commission, and even people who just recommend to friends and family can make thousands easily. To begin and get this specific deal that has been outlined, visit [url removed, login to view] and create an account. After creating an account, visit the Contact Us page at [url removed, login to view] and tell us your new account username is from the freelancer deal. There is no cost or fee, so there is literally no reason not to try it out. After creating an account, visit both the "How to get sales counted on Trexseo" page under the seller menu and the "Selling information" page to learn how to use the Trexseo platform easily. The shop of products that you can sell is available at [url removed, login to view]; you can just hit the Shop link on the website in order to access it as well. Thank you.
title: Sell something for me

desc: Company descriptionFF GROUP TOOL INDUSTRIES is a well-known and fast-growing hand tools supplier with extensive experience in the t Hand Tools industry Industry,and in deep depth knowledge of tools’ innovation, design, and manufacture, that which nowatodays has developed evolved into a very powerful group of brands.Our products are sold in 23 countries around the world and we are expanding our sales network rapidly very quickly by hiring ambitious and talented Tool Expert Sales People ready to get on board and be members in the building of the most successful tool brands of the future.[url removed, login to view] [url removed, login to view] [url removed, login to view] [url removed, login to view]Job descriptionThe most worm welcome and great acceptance of our Brands After having excellent acceptance of our Brands in the French part of Belgium, which was led by our with our current local Sales Manager has driven us to the decision we are willing to hire our second area Area sales Sales manager Manager for the Flemish Part.  We are looking for an ambitious sales person who knows the Belgium Market of DIY, Power Tools and Building Materials like the back of his hand. This The candidate potentially could become our Area Sales Manager which would in order to take off his career. The chosen selected candidate will needs to be a proven leader, will have the relevant experience in the Hand Tool Industries marketsMarket, strong market networking and proven “active” clientele, and will have a successful track record of increasing sales while managing a cross-functional team.  We are also are looking for candidates with passion for the tool sector, DIY fans, open to those who want to be a differentiate, boost their carrier and become a leader and have passion for the tool sector! We offer full support, training and sales organization system to evolve and become can help him with all the efforts that needed to be the best experienced sales person!Our ProposalOur proposal is addressed to a small business man, an entrepreneur, and not to a usual typical employee relationship. We don’t want to offer just a simple work position with conventional conditions. We are willing to offer very high renumerations earnings and benefits which are corresponding to a small businessman. Everything depends on your abilities (as described above), your willingness and efforts to expand cCompany’s business in the really big market of Belgium and of course on the results that you will bring us. If you have possess the above mentioned characteristics and industry’s know–how plus you hold a proved proven successful tracking record in sales, then you are the candidate that we are looking for!Tasks•	Develop company’s business-progression in the Flemish part of Belgium•	Ability to work in a field based role, executing a daily-weekly customer visit programplan, planned as composed by both the company and the candidate•	Promote and sampling sample our products by while performing live testsing them live during the sales customer visits•	Providing Fulfill the required reports on the progress of the day-to-day sales activities and results as required by Company, and providing necessary back-up to support sales and bonus programs objectives.•	Daily usage of  the company’s software- ERP as a tool of conducting business•	In-depth knowledge of Belgium tools market, key players, sales channels, regional key features, while holding an active and updated clients’ list of wholesalers, DIY chain stores, hardware and independent stores•	New product introduction, placement and sampling throughout the whole sales network•	Performing other duties as may be assigned from time to time.Job qualifications•	At least 5 years work experience in a sales environment preferably in the hand tools or building materials industry•	Strong customer orientation and negotiation skills•	Bachelor Degree in Business Administration, Economics or in relevant area (Master degree, is considered as an asset)•	Expert knowledge on the steps of the sales process•	Results-oriented & Self-disciplined•	French Flemish & English fluent written & spoken (Proficiency)•	Strong organizational skills and ability to multi-task, prioritize work and manage deadlines•	Strong communication skills•	Willingness and ability to travel regularly by  car around Belgium  and stay overnights when required•	Computer skills and skype meeting are required•	Car license•	Ability to travel to FF GROUP’s headquarters and also to visit customers along with our area managerWe offer•	Extremely competitive High remuneration, pack while offering through a total compensation package higher than the competition!!•	A Great opportunity to evolve to a become Sales Manager or Country Mmanager to run the whole business in Belgium.•	Territory of operation will be determined in relation relative to the zone area of residence•	Training course in headquarters•	Initial filed visits Introduction to the territory zone of operation in along together with ourArea Manager
